snippet.title: Best way to stay fit in winter | EXR | Indoor rowing app
snippet.description:
No option to train outdoors, but longing to explore the world's best rowing venues? Discover famous rowing locations like Boston, Lake Bled and Henley-on-Thames from the comfort of your home gym! Level up your skills and make new friends in EXR’s virtual worlds. Discover the best way to stay fit in winter now!

#exr #rowingmachine #homeworkout 

— 

Follow EXR on social media:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/exrgame/
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/exrgame/
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@exrgame

Join the Facebook EXR Community:
https://www.facebook.com/groups/20515...
Join EXR on Discord:
https://discord.gg/QuNPgtCNuc
Join the EXR subreddit:
https://www.reddit.com/r/EXRofficial/
Join the EXR Strava Club:
https://www.strava.com/clubs/739056

—

Start your free trial and download the app to your iOS, Android, MacOS, Windows or Apple TV device. Connecting your rower is as simple as can be. EXR is compatible with all FTMS rowers and supports Concept2, WaterRower, RP3, Xebex, Technogym, First Degree Fitness and many more. 

Are you ready for your EXRcise on virtual waters? Get the indoor rowing app
